title: Decrease taxes, adm int rates to fight recession

content.question: Which of the following combinations of fiscal and monetary policies will correct a severe recession?

choices.label: Increasing income tax rates and increasing administered interest rates
Increasing income tax rates and decreasing administered interest rates
Decreasing income tax rates and increasing administered interest rates
Decreasing income tax rates and decreasing administered interest rates
Decreasing income tax rates and increasing the policy rate

content.answer: Decreasing income tax rates and decreasing administered interest rates
